title: Chocolate mousse brownies
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '30g dark chocolate', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg, room temperature', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '5 tablespoons plain flour', '1/8 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '120g dark chocolate, chopped', '3 tablespoons strong brewed coffee', '3 eggs, separated', '250ml double cream, divided', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', 'For decorating', 'chocolate espresso coffee beans (optional)']
